primary.request: Make a maintenance payment over the phone
primary.context: Caller refused the digital link and insisted on speaking to someone to pay
primary.detail: The caller requested to pay over the phone and was transferred to a queue where they waited for over 25 minutes before disconnecting.

steps: Caller requested to make a maintenance payment.
AI offered to send a payment link via text or email.
Caller refused the link and requested to pay over the phone.
AI transferred the caller to the concierge queue.
Caller waited in the queue for approximately 25 minutes while hold music/messages played.
Caller appeared to be playing a recording or was in a noisy environment (Turn 6/8) before hanging up.

impediment.detail: The caller was stuck in a transfer queue for over 25 minutes without reaching an agent.

corrections.note: Caller corrected AI's offer of a link, requesting phone payment.

actions.detail: Transferred to concierge queue per customer request.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to make a maintenance payment over the phone. After refusing the AI's offer of a digital link, they were transferred to a queue where they waited for 25 minutes before abandoning.
insights.verbatim: No. On the phone. I'm gonna call and make it over the phone payment.
